An individual post follows.

Tonight’s Show: More Random BS

I think previously themed and genred radio show is degenerating – or evolving, if you prefer it – into a DJ mix sort of deal. Same great content, none of the fuss of categorization. I think I’ve figured out the software/hardware thing for laptop DJing, too (though tonight’s mix will be from iTunes): use an actual goddamn DJ mixer, and just let the laptop act as glorified CD decks. Traktor can do that, and the radio station has a mixer. I’ll give it a go next week, but that’s not to say you won’t enjoy tonight’s selections, which properly suit a cold early spring day. Tune in at 7pm EST.

  1. Metamatics – Here to Go
  2. Cex – Julia Walsh
  3. The Black Dog With Black Sifichi – Wishing Well
  4. Hendrik + David – sus
  5. Keith Fullerton Whitman – Track3a (2waynice)
  6. Stars As Eyes – Where Do My Children Go At Night
  7. Aphex Twin – Heroes (Aphex Twin Remix)
  8. Paul D. Miller (DJ Spooky) – Striated Interlude #1
  9. Andreas Tilliander – Untitled Track 6
  10. Oblique – Construction
  11. Squarepusher – u.f.o.’s over leytonstone
—Mar 31, 2003
